# TASK::SET_DRIVE_TASK_MAX_CRUISE_SPEED

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **FLOAT** maxCruiseSpeed

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Sets the drive tasks maximum cruise speed. If MaxCruiseSpeed is set to 0 then it is ignored.
